pageProduct.name: Systane Hydration Unit Dose Preservative Free 30 x 0.7ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Systane® HYDRATION UD is a preservative-free lubricating eye drop combining a unique gelling agent, HP-Guar. It has been shown to provide 2x greater moisture retention compared to drops which contain hyaluronic acid alone#. This unique formulation offers long lasting dry eye relief, providing hydration and protection for the surface of the eye.

Systane® HYDRATION UD is suitable for sensitive dry eyes, for dry eye symptoms post ocular surgery and also for soft contact lens wearers.

*Contains sodium hyaluronate, the salt form of hyaluronic acid #Than hyaluronic acid in a laboratory study. 1. IQVIA 01 TEARS S1K SELL-IN VALUE MAT 2021-02. 2. Ranagarajan R. et al. J Ocul Pharmacol Ther. 2015; 31(8):491-497. (Sponsored by Alcon).

ALWAYS READ THE LABEL. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS FOR USE.

IF SYMPTOMS PERSIST, TALK TO YOUR HEALTH PROFESSIONAL

^Sodium hyaluronate, the salt form of hyaluronic acid.

Reference: 1. Rangarajan et al. J Ocul Pharmacol Th. 2019; 35(1): 32-37 (Sponsored by Novartis). 2. Gokul, A. et al. Cont Lens Anterior Eye 2018; 41: 97-100. 3. Rangarajan, R., et al. (2015) . J Ocul Pharmacol Ther. 31 (8). p.491-497 Systane Hydration UD Lubricant Eye Drops is a sterile solution containing sodium hyaluronate, polyethylene glycol 400, propylene glycol, hydroxypropyl guar, sorbitol, aminomethyl propanol, boric acid, sodium borate, potassium chloride and sodium chloride. Do not use if allergic to any of these ingredients. ©2021 Alcon AU; Auckland NZ: 0800 101 106. ANZ-SYB-2100003

General Information

Systance Lubricant Eye Drops Hydration UD contains Hyaluronate, prolonged long-lasting relief for dry eyes and suitable for use with soft contact lenses.

Systance Hydration UD Lubricant Eye Drops entrap water to promote hydration, lubrication and provide prolonged, long lasting relief. It also allows restoration of the damaged cells in the ocular surface.

For the temporary relief of burning and irritation due to dryness of the eye. May also be used for rewetting of all silicone hydrogel and soft (hydrophilic) contact lenses for minor irritation, discomfort and blurring.

Suitable For: Suitable for use with soft contact lenses.

Product Claims: Preservative free

Boxed Contents: 30 vials (Sterile A) x 0.7mL

Size: 30 Pack x 0.7mL

Warnings

It is essential that you follow your eye care practitioner's directions and all labelling instructions for proper use of the product.

If you experience persistent eye discomfort, excessive tearing, vision changes, or redness of the eye, stop using Systane Hydration UD and consult your eye care practitioner as the problem could become more serious. Systane Hydration UD Lubricant Eye Drops is not indicated for use as a cleanser or disinfectant for contact lenses. Do not soak or disinfect your lenses in Systane Hydration UD Lubricant Eye Drops.

People allergic to any ingredient in Systane Hydration UD Lubricant Eye Drops should not use this product.

Tamper Evident: Do not use if package or unit dose vials are opened or damaged.

PRECAUTIONS

- To avoid contamination, never touch the tip of the vial to any surface.
- Use before the expiration date marked on the product.
- Discard any remaining contents after use. Do not save solution in an opened vial. Do not reuse
- Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Systane Hydration UD Lubricant Eye Drops is a sterile solution containing sodium hyaluronate, polyethylene glycol 400, propylene glycol, hydroxypropyl guar, sorbitol, aminomethyl propanol, boric acid, sodium borate, potassium chloride and sodium chloride.

Directions

Twist off the top of the single-use vial, instil one or two drops in the eye(s) and blink. Discard vial after use. Systane Hydration UD Lubricant Eye Drops may be used as needed throughout the day to relieve the symptoms of dry eye. While wearing contact lenses, if minor irritation, discomfort, or blurring occurs, twist off the top of the single-use vial and place 1 or 2 drops on the lens and blink 2 or 3 times.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store between 5 to 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Between 5 to 25°C.
